introduction.description: I’m a Junior Full Stack Developer based in Italy. I am passionate about technology and always looking for new challenges.

projects.title: Some of my projects
projects.future: New projects are in progress... stay tuned!

pittari.title: Pittari Website
pittari.description: The project combines a passion for languages with web development. Pittari (ピッタリ in Japanese) is a portal that offers various useful features for learning Japanese. From kanji search to articles and forums, Pittari provides comprehensive resources for Japanese language learners.

petcenter.title: Pet Center
petcenter.description: Welcome to Pet Center, your online hub for everything related to pets. A particular focus on CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete).

gym_laravel.title: Gym Management
gym_laravel.description: A platform that allows users to book a wide range of activities and courses managed by registered providers. Users can explore various categories of activities such as sports, hobbies.

gym_wordpress.title: Dynamic Body Gym
gym_wordpress.description: This WordPress website is designed for a gym and wellness center, offering comprehensive features to cater to members and potential clients alike. It serves as a central hub for information about gym services, operating hours, fitness classes, and more.

weather.title: Raining Bot
weather.description: Raining Bot is a Node.js-based Discord bot designed to provide real-time weather updates and forecasts. This bot leverages weather APIs to deliver accurate and timely weather information directly to your Discord server.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.welcome: Welcome to Vincenzo's portfolio website. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal information when you visit our website and use our contact form. By using this website, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.
privacy-policy.collect: When you use our contact form, we collect the following information: name, to personalize our communication; email address: to respond to your inquires
privacy-policy.purpose: The information collected through our contact form is used solely for the purpose of: responding to your inquiries and messages, providing you with information related to our services or work.
privacy-policy.process: We process your personal data in accordance with the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Italian Legislative Decree no. 196/2003, as amended by Legislative Decree no. 101/2018, and other applicable laws. Our legal basis for processing your information is your consent, which you provide when you submit your information via the contact form.
privacy-policy.no-share: We do not share, sell, or distribute your personal information to third parties, except when required by law.
privacy-policy.international: Our website is accessible worldwide. If you are accessing our website from outside the European Union, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in Italy. By using our services, you consent to such transfer, storage, and processing.
privacy-policy.update: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the effective date will be updated accordingly.
privacy-policy.contacts: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: vincenzosa26@icloud.com
privacy-policy.date: This Privacy Policy is effective as of 2024/07/09.
